TopicTitle: The Eater of seals (and humies) has arrived....

Articles.Content:
Hi guys! Name's Barry, and I enjoy playing games. I'm also farily nuts. Long story short, as soon as this forum lets me, I'll put up the BarryTar ( A polar bear, i've been using that 'tar for a decade and a half now) , and that will explain the following:

It was after all only a matter of time before the Intergalatic grEAT ProgrammE Of PoLarbEar migration was started.... The polar ice caps are melting, we need a new home. Kerballs look edible, so I shall populate planets with them as to have a food source for my people.

So far I have established that the I-EAT-PEOPLE has the following branches:

PUSCA- the Polarbear Unbeared Spaceship Construction Agency - responsible for all unbeared spaceships

PKSP - the Polarbear Kerball Saturation Programme - the folks who are supposed to saturate space with Kerballs to eat. They do the Kerbonaut flights.

So hi!

Edited May 25, 2013 by Baranor
